    <TD STYLE="font-size: 10pt; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font-size: 10pt; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font-size: 10pt; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: bottom; background-color: rgb(204,238,255)">
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; padding-left: 0.125in; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><B>Other
    Revenues <SUP>(9)</SUP></B></FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">312</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">370</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">682</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">(29</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">)</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">(50</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">)</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">(79</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">)</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">241</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">221</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">382</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><B>*</B></FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><B>*</B></FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><B>*</B></FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><B>*</B></FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
  </TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 5pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt">*
200% or greater</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 5pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt">Sum
of quarterly amounts may not equal year-to-date amounts due to rounding.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 5pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><SUP>(1)</SUP>&nbsp;Only
select products are shown.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 5pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><SUP>(2)</SUP>&nbsp;Alliance
Revenue represents Merck&rsquo;s share of profits, which are product sales net of cost of sales and commercialization costs.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 5pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><SUP>(3)</SUP>&nbsp;Alliance
Revenue represents royalties and a milestone payment.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 5pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><SUP>(4)</SUP>&nbsp;Total
Vaccines sales were $2,481 million and $2,709 million in the first and second quarter of 2022, respectively, and $1,809 million, $2,293
million, $3,315 million and $2,715 million in the first, second, third and fourth quarter of 2021, respectively.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 5pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><SUP>(5)</SUP>&nbsp;Alliance
Revenue represents Merck's share of profits from sales in Bayer's marketing territories, which are product sales net of cost of sales
and commercialization costs.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 5pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><SUP>(6)</SUP>&nbsp;Net
product sales in Merck's marketing territories.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 5pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><SUP>(7)</SUP>&nbsp;Total
Diabetes sales were $1,305 million and $1,300 million in the first and second quarter of 2022, respectively, and $1,363 million, $1,330
million, $1,417 million and $1,475 million in the first, second, third and fourth quarter of 2021, respectively.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 5pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><SUP>(8)</SUP>&nbsp;Includes
Pharmaceutical products not individually shown above. </FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6pt"><SUP>(9)</SUP>&nbsp;Other
Revenues are comprised primarily of third-party manufacturing sales and miscellaneous corporate revenues, including revenue hedging
activities.&nbsp;&nbsp;Other Revenues related to the receipt of upfront and milestone payments for out-licensed products were $114
million and $32 million in the first and second quarter of 2022, respectively, and $56 million, $135 million and $27 million in the
first, third and fourth quarter of 2021, respectively. </FONT> <FONT STYLE="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</FONT></P>


<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"></P>

<P STYLE="margin: 0; text-align: right; font-size: 10pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt"><B>Exhibit 99.2</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="margin: 0; font-size: 10pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="text-align: center; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>MERCK&nbsp;&amp; CO.,&nbsp;INC.</B></FONT> <FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT> <FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="text-align: center; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>CONSOLIDATED STATEMENT OF INCOME - GAAP</B></FONT> <FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT> <FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="margin: 0; font-size: 10pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="text-align: center; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>MERCK&nbsp;&amp; CO.,&nbsp;INC. </B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="text-align: center; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>SECOND QUARTER AND SIX MONTHS ENDED JUNE 30, 2021 GAAP TO NON-GAAP RECONCILIATION - CONTINUING OPERATIONS</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="text-align: center; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>(AMOUNTS IN MILLIONS, EXCEPT PER SHARE FIGURES)</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="text-align: center; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>(UNAUDITED)</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="text-align: center; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>Table 2b</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">In 2022, the company changed the treatment of certain items for purposes of its non-GAAP reporting.&nbsp;&nbsp;Historically, Merck&rsquo;s non-GAAP results excluded expenses for upfront and milestone payments related to collaborations and licensing agreements, as well as charges related to pre-approval assets obtained in transactions accounted for as asset acquisitions, to the extent the charges were considered by the company to be significant to the results of a particular period (as well as any related adjustments recorded in a subsequent period). Beginning in 2022, Merck&rsquo;s non-GAAP results no longer exclude charges related to these items. Results for 2021 have been recast to conform to the new presentation.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">The table below reflects a reconciliation of GAAP to non-GAAP financial information on a continuing operations basis. As Organon results are reflected within discontinued operations, they are excluded from the financial information provided below. </FONT></P>


<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt">Only
the line items that are affected by non-GAAP adjustments are shown.</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt">Merck
is providing certain non-GAAP information that excludes certain items because of the nature of these items and the impact they have on
the analysis of underlying business performance and trends. Management believes that providing non-GAAP information enhances investors&rsquo;
understanding of the company&rsquo;s results because management uses non-GAAP measures to assess performance. Management uses non-GAAP
measures internally for planning and forecasting purposes and to measure the performance of the company along with other metrics. In
addition, senior management&rsquo;s annual compensation is derived in part using a non-GAAP pretax income metric. The non-GAAP information
presented should be considered in addition to, but not as a substitute for or superior to, information prepared in accordance with GAAP.
</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(1)&nbsp;</SUP>Amounts
included in cost of sales primarily reflect expenses for the amortization of intangible assets.&nbsp;&nbsp;Amounts included in selling,
general and administrative expenses reflect integration, transaction and certain other costs related to acquisitions and divestitures.&nbsp;&nbsp;Amounts
included in research and development expenses primarily reflect expenses for the amortization of intangible assets.&nbsp;&nbsp;Amounts
included in other (income) expense, net, for the second quarter and six month period primarily reflect an increase in the estimated fair
value measurement of liabilities for contingent consideration related to the prior termination of the Sanofi-Pasteur MSD joint venture
and a loss on a forward exchange contract entered into in conjunction with the Organon spin-off.&nbsp;&nbsp;Amount included in other
(income) expense, net, for the six month period was partially offset by royalty income related to the prior termination of the Sanofi-Pasteur
MSD joint venture.</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(2)&nbsp;</SUP>Amounts
primarily include employee separation costs and accelerated depreciation associated with facilities to be closed or divested related
to activities under the company's formal restructuring programs.</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(3)</SUP>&nbsp;Represents
charges for the discontinuation of COVID-19 development programs.</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(4)</SUP>&nbsp;Represents
the estimated tax impacts on the reconciling items based on applying the statutory rate of the originating territory of the non-GAAP
adjustments.&nbsp;&nbsp;Certain other items for the six month period also includes a $207 million net tax benefit related to the settlement
of certain federal income tax matters.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt">*
200% or greater</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt">Sum
of U.S. plus international may not equal global due to rounding.</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(1)</SUP>&nbsp;Only
select products are shown.&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(2)</SUP>&nbsp;Alliance
Revenue represents Merck&rsquo;s share of profits, which are product sales net of cost of sales and commercialization costs.</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(3)</SUP>&nbsp;Alliance
Revenue represents royalties.</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(4)</SUP>&nbsp;Total
Vaccines sales were $2,709 million in the second quarter of 2022 and $2,293 million in the second quarter of 2021.</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(5)</SUP>&nbsp;Alliance
Revenue represents Merck's share of profits from sales in Bayer's marketing territories, which are product sales net of cost of sales
and commercialization costs.</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(6)</SUP>&nbsp;Net
product sales in Merck's marketing territories.</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(7)</SUP>&nbsp;Total
Diabetes sales were $1,300 million in the second quarter of 2022 and $1,330 million in the second quarter of 2021.</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(8)</SUP>&nbsp;Includes
Pharmaceutical products not individually shown above.</FONT></P>



<P STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt"><SUP>(9)</SUP>&nbsp;Other
Revenues are comprised primarily of third-party manufacturing sales and miscellaneous corporate revenues, including revenue hedging activities.
Other Revenues related to the receipt of milestone payments for out-licensed products were $32 million in the second quarter of 2022.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 6.5pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 6.5pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P>

CO.,&nbsp;INC.</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="text-align: center; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>FRANCHISE

<P STYLE="text-align: center; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>JUNE

<P STYLE="text-align: center; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>(AMOUNTS

    <TD STYLE="font: bold 6pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: 6pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 7pt">*</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="font: 6pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
  </TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 7pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 7pt">*
200% or greater</FONT> <FONT STYLE="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 7pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 7pt">Sum
of U.S. plus international may not equal global due to rounding.</FONT> <FONT STYLE="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;
 &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 7pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 7pt"><SUP>(1)</SUP>&nbsp;Only
select products are shown.&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 7pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 7pt"><SUP>(2)</SUP>&nbsp;Alliance
Revenue represents Merck&rsquo;s share of profits, which are product sales net of cost of sales and commercialization costs.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 7pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 7pt"><SUP>(3)</SUP>&nbsp;Alliance
Revenue represents royalties and a milestone payment.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 7pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 7pt"><SUP>(4)</SUP>&nbsp;Total
Vaccines sales were $5,191 million and $4,102 million on a global basis for June&nbsp;YTD 2022 and 2021, respectively.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 7pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 7pt"><SUP>(5)</SUP>&nbsp;Alliance
Revenue represents Merck's share of profits from sales in Bayer's marketing territories, which are product sales net of cost of sales
and commercialization costs.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 7pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 7pt"><SUP>(6)</SUP>&nbsp;Net
product sales in Merck's marketing territories.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 7pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 7pt"><SUP>(7)</SUP>&nbsp;Total
Diabetes sales were $2,605 million and $2,693 million on a global basis for June&nbsp;YTD 2022 and 2021, respectively.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 7pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 7pt"><SUP>(8)</SUP>&nbsp;Includes
Pharmaceutical products not individually shown above.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 7pt"><SUP>(9)</SUP>&nbsp;Other
Revenues are comprised primarily of third-party manufacturing sales and miscellaneous corporate revenues, including revenue hedging
activities. Other Revenues related to the receipt of upfront and milestone payments for out-licensed products were $146 million and
$56 million on a global basis for June&nbsp;YTD 2022 and 2021, respectively. </FONT> <FONT STYLE="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;</FONT> <FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>


<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

of quarterly amounts may not equal year-to-date amounts due to rounding.</FONT> <FONT STYLE="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp; &nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="margin-left: 0.25in; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><SUP>(1)&nbsp;</SUP>Includes
net realized and unrealized gains and losses from investments in equity securities either owned directly or through ownership interests
in investment funds.&nbsp;&nbsp;Unrealized gains and losses from investments that are directly owned are determined at the end of the
reporting period, while gains and losses from ownership interests in investment funds are accounted for on a one quarter lag.</FONT></P>


<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<SEQUENCE>12
<FILENAME>Show.js
<DESCRIPTION>IDEA: XBRL DOCUMENT
<TEXT>
// Edgar(tm) Renderer was created by staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Data and content created by government employees within the scope of their employment are not subject to domestic copyright protection. 17 U.S.C. 105.
var Show={};Show.LastAR=null,Show.showAR=function(a,r,w){if(Show.LastAR)Show.hideAR();var e=a;while(e&&e.nodeName!='TABLE')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e||e.nodeName!='TABLE'){var ref=((window)?w.document:document).getElementById(r);if(ref){e=ref.cloneNode(!0);
e.removeAttribute('id');a.parentNode.appendChild(e)}}
if(e)e.style.display='block';Show.LastAR=e};Show.hideAR=function(){Show.LastAR.style.display='none'};Show.toggleNext=function(a){var e=a;while(e.nodeName!='DIV')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e.style){}else if(!e.style.display){}else{var d,p_;if(e.style.display=='none'){d='block';p='-'}else{d='none';p='+'}
e.style.display=d;if(a.textContent){a.textContent=p+a.textContent.substring(1)}else{a.innerText=p+a.innerText.substring(1)}}}
</TEXT>

/* Updated 2009-11-04 */
/* v2.2.0.24 */

/* DefRef Styles */
..report table.authRefData{
	background-color: #def;
	border: 2px solid #2F4497;
	font-size: 1em;
	position: absolute;
}

..report table.authRefData a {
	display: block;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report table.authRefData p {
	margin-top: 0px;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide {
	background-color: #2F4497;
	padding: 1px 3px 0px 0px;
	text-align: right;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide a:hover {
	background-color: #2F4497;
}

..report table.authRefData .body {
	height: 150px;
	overflow: auto;
	width: 400px;
}

..report table.authRefData table{
	font-size: 1em;
}

/* Report Styles */
..pl a, .pl a:visited {
	color: black;
	text-decoration: none;
}

/* table */
..report {
	background-color: white;
	border: 2px solid #acf;
	clear: both;
	color: black;
	font: normal 8pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

..report hr {
	border: 1px solid #acf;
}

/* Top labels */
..report th {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
	text-align: center;
}

..report th.void	{
	background-color: transparent;
	color: #000000;
	font: bold 10pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	text-align: left;
}

..report .pl {
	text-align: left;
	vertical-align: top;
	white-space: normal;
	width: 200px;
	white-space: normal; /* word-wrap: break-word; */
}

..report td.pl a.a {
	cursor: pointer;
	display: block;
	width: 200px;
	overflow: hidden;
}

..report td.pl div.a {
	width: 200px;
}

..report td.pl a:hover {
	background-color: #ffc;
}

/* Header rows... */
..report tr.rh {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
}

/* Calendars... */
..report .rc {
	background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

/* Even rows... */
..report .re, .report .reu {
	background-color: #def;
}

..report .reu td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

/* Odd rows... */
..report .ro, .report .rou {
	background-color: white;
}

..report .rou td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

..report .rou table td, .report .reu table td {
	border-bottom: 0px solid black;
}

/* styles for footnote marker */
..report .fn {
	white-space: nowrap;
}

/* styles for numeric types */
..report .num, .report .nump {
	text-align: right;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

..report .nump {
	padding-left: 2em;
}

..report .nump {
	padding: 0px 0.4em 0px 2em;
}

/* styles for text types */
..report .text {
	text-align: left;
	white-space: normal;
}

..report .text .big {
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	width: 17em;
}

..report .text .more {
	display: none;
}

..report .text .note {
	font-style: italic;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report .text .small {
	width: 10em;
}

..report sup {
	font-style: italic;
}

..report .outerFootnotes {
	font-size: 1em;
}
</TEXT>
